item.title: First
item.description: I made my blog site with Hugo and easy-hugo. 1. Make repos. on github as follow blog tkondoh1022.github.io 2. Make work-dir. 1$ cd ~/work-github 2$ hugo new site blog 3$ cd blog 4$ cd theme 5$ git clone https://github.com/mattbutton/silhouette-hugo.git 6$ rm -rf silhouette-hugo/.git 7 8$ cd ../ 9$ edit config.toml 10 11$ hugo new post/first.md 12$ edit content/post/first.md 13$ hugo server --buildDrafts --watch 3. Push repos. 1$ git init 2$ git remote add origin git@github.
